rows.label: qst101001_msg0001
rows.name: Are you the one who broke the crane?!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0002
rows.name:
I see, it wasn't you...
Sorry for accusing you.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0003
rows.name: Are you interested?

rows.label: qst101001_msg0004
rows.name:
You see, our precious partner,
the crane... its wire got cut.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0005
rows.name:
At first I thought it had frayed,
but it wasn't just cut once.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0006
rows.name:
No matter how many times we fix
it, by morning, it's cut again.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0007
rows.name:
If it's cut this often,
it's not a coincidence...
Someone's doing this.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0008
rows.name:
We have to make up for the work we
lost because the wire was cut.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0009
rows.name:
But since we can't use the
crane, we're not making any
progress... What should we do?

rows.label: qst101001_msg0010
rows.name: Really? Thank you!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0011
rows.name:
There are two things
I'd like you to do.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0012
rows.name:
I want to repair the crane
so we can use it again.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0013
rows.name:
The repairs are up to
Mache, the crane operator.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0014
rows.name: Ask him for the details.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0015
rows.name:
The other thing is... find the
culprit who cut the wire and
give them a good talking to!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0016
rows.name: But we have no information on that.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0017
rows.name:
My apprentice, Pettle, is
eager to find the culprit,
so could you hear him out?

rows.label: qst101001_msg0018
rows.name:
The crane is along the outer
wall. They should both be there.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0019
rows.name: Well then, I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0201
rows.name:
For the crane repairs,
please ask Mache.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0202
rows.name:
The other thing is finding the
culprit who cut the crane wire...

rows.label: qst101001_msg0203
rows.name:
Please hear out my apprentice,
Pettle. I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0301
rows.name:
I hear you did a great job
helping with the crane
repairs! Thanks a bunch!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0302
rows.name: But wait, it's not over yet.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0303
rows.name:
No matter how many times we repair the
crane, if we don't catch the culprit,
the wire will just get cut again...

rows.label: qst101001_msg0304
rows.name: I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0401
rows.name:
Yeah! Pettle told me! To think
the culprits were Tirkin...

rows.label: qst101001_msg0402
rows.name: But wait, it's not over yet.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0403
rows.name:
We don't have to worry about the
wire being cut again, but we can't
work if we don't repair the crane.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0404
rows.name: I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0501
rows.name: Yeah! I heard from Mache and Pettle!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0502
rows.name:
To cut through Mache's special,
thick wire, they must be some
incredible Tirkin.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0503
rows.name:
They seem like they'd work harder
than that useless guard, Rahim.

rows.label: qst101001_msg0504
rows.name:
Well then... The Tirkin culprits
have been dealt with, and the
crane repairs are done!

rows.label: qst101001_msg0505
rows.name:
The Saets Lumber Co. was
saved by you! I'll be sure
to reward you properly!
